short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the specified German verb conjugation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The user inputs a German verb and this extension displays its conjugations in four different tenses, which the user can access by clicking on the different tabs.
